home.description1: I'm a web developer and I love turning ideas into functional and beautiful web applications. Over the past few years, I've built projects with modern technologies like

home.description3: I enjoy creating useful, intuitive things â€” and sometimes just for fun (why not?). Whether it's a SaaS platform, a mobile app, or a small personal project that grew bigger, I love bringing concepts to life and learning new things along the way. I'm currently exploring backend architecture, system design, and a bit of mobile development.
